wikipedia_page.main: Dafydd ap Gwilym (c. 1315/1320 – c. 1350/1370) is regarded as one of the leading Welsh poets and amongst the great poets of Europe in the Middle Ages. (Dafydd ap Gwilym scholar R. Geraint Gruffydd suggests c. 1315-c. 1350 as his dates; other scholars place him a little later, c. 1320-c. 1370.)
